## Selective.exhaust() method

Ensure that this [Selective](./alfa-selective.selective_class.md) is exhaustively matched, returning its resulting value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
exhaust<T>(this: Selective<never, T>): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | [Selective](./alfa-selective.selective_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;never, T&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

T

## Remarks

This method should only be used for cases where [Selective.get()](./alfa-selective.selective_class.get_1_method.md) is insufficient. If in doubt, assume that it isn't.
